name: Nathan For You: Screening and Q&A
bio: Show creators Nathan Fielder and Michael Koman appear live and in person to give you a sneak peak of the upcoming season of Nathan For You. The screening will be followed by a Q&A discussion that will include several off-the-cuff jokes by Fielder and Koman. (Refunds available if Fielder and Koman fail to amuse.)
